MSVC_erfc.h

00001 #ifndef OPENMM_MSVC_ERFC_H_
00002 #define OPENMM_MSVC_ERFC_H_
00003 
00004 /*
00005  * At least up to version 8 (VC++ 2005), Microsoft does not support the
00006  * standard C99 erf() and erfc() functions. For now we're including these
00007  * definitions for an MSVC compilation; if these are added later then
00008  * the #ifdef below should change to compare _MSC_VER with a particular
00009  * version level.
00010  */
00011 
00012 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00013 
00014 
00015 /***************************
00016 *   erf.cpp
00017 *   author:  Steve Strand
00018 *   written: 29-Jan-04
00019 ***************************/
00020 
00021 #include <cmath>
00022 
00023 static const double rel_error= 1E-12;        //calculate 12 significant figures
00024 //you can adjust rel_error to trade off between accuracy and speed
00025 //but don't ask for > 15 figures (assuming usual 52 bit mantissa in a double)
00026 
00027 static double erfc(double x);
00028 
00029 static double erf(double x)
00030 //erf(x) = 2/sqrt(pi)*integral(exp(-t^2),t,0,x)
00031 //       = 2/sqrt(pi)*[x - x^3/3 + x^5/5*2! - x^7/7*3! + ...]
00032 //       = 1-erfc(x)
00033 {
00034     static const double two_sqrtpi=  1.128379167095512574;        // 2/sqrt(pi)
00035     if (fabs(x) > 2.2) {
00036         return 1.0 - erfc(x);        //use continued fraction when fabs(x) > 2.2
00037     }
00038     double sum= x, term= x, xsqr= x*x;
00039     int j= 1;
00040     do {
00041         term*= xsqr/j;
00042         sum-= term/(2*j+1);
00043         ++j;
00044         term*= xsqr/j;
00045         sum+= term/(2*j+1);
00046         ++j;
00047     } while (fabs(term)/sum > rel_error);
00048     return two_sqrtpi*sum;
00049 }
00050 
00051 
00052 static double erfc(double x)
00053 //erfc(x) = 2/sqrt(pi)*integral(exp(-t^2),t,x,inf)
00054 //        = exp(-x^2)/sqrt(pi) * [1/x+ (1/2)/x+ (2/2)/x+ (3/2)/x+ (4/2)/x+ ...]
00055 //        = 1-erf(x)
00056 //expression inside [] is a continued fraction so '+' means add to denominator only
00057 {
00058     static const double one_sqrtpi=  0.564189583547756287;        // 1/sqrt(pi)
00059     if (fabs(x) < 2.2) {
00060         return 1.0 - erf(x);        //use series when fabs(x) < 2.2
00061     }
00062     // Don't look for x==0 here!
00063     if (x < 0) {               //continued fraction only valid for x>0
00064         return 2.0 - erfc(-x);
00065     }
00066     double a=1, b=x;                //last two convergent numerators
00067     double c=x, d=x*x+0.5;          //last two convergent denominators
00068     double q1, q2= b/d;             //last two convergents (a/c and b/d)
00069     double n= 1.0, t;
00070     do {
00071         t= a*n+b*x;
00072         a= b;
00073         b= t;
00074         t= c*n+d*x;
00075         c= d;
00076         d= t;
00077         n+= 0.5;
00078         q1= q2;
00079         q2= b/d;
00080       } while (fabs(q1-q2)/q2 > rel_error);
00081     return one_sqrtpi*exp(-x*x)*q2;
00082 }
00083 
00084 #endif // _MSC_VER
00085 
00086 #endif // OPENMM_MSVC_ERFC_H_
